thread.title: Resident Evil 4: Wii Edition is coming soon to the Wii U eShop - Gaming
thread.title_full: Resident Evil 4: Wii Edition is coming soon to the Wii U eShop - Gaming News - Digital Spy

author: Albaraa Fahmy
title: Resident Evil 4: Wii Edition is coming soon to the Wii U eShop - Gaming
text: Wii U owners will soon be able to relive the Resident Evil 4: Wii Edition experience.The Wii version of Capcom's survival-horror classic will re-release via the Nintendo eShop on October 29. Â© Capcom It will launch with a 25% discount, which will be offered until November 5.Despite its numbering, Resident Evil 4 was the sixth main entry in the series, released for Nintendo GameCube in North America and Japan in January 2005 before being ported to PlayStation 2 and later other platforms.The story marked the return of Resident Evil 2 protagonist Leon S Kennedy and picked up six years after the events of the second instalment, following the former cop on a mission to rescue the president's daughter from the clutches of an arcane cult in a rural European village.It also replaced the series' omnipresent zombies with Los Ganados, human hosts to a mind-controlling parasite.Resident Evil 4 turns 10: How Capcom redefined the third-person shooterCheck out our most anticipated games of October, one of many videos in Digital Spy's dedicated Gaming YouTube channel. Be sure to subscribe!
